parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there. Of uncertain affinity; there; by extension, thither.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A colt, young ass, foal. Apparently a primary word; a 'foal' or 'filly', i.e., a young ass.
